title: Anyone know what font these are?
content:
Youre help would really be appreciated! Im at a lost, but I know it is so easy!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214104im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture11_5822.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214104im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Picture12_5218.jpg)

 [‹ What is this Stretched Serif?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45390 "Go to previous forum topic") [Please Identify this or similar typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080708214104/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45380 "Go to next forum topic")
author: default720

comments.content:
The sans is Helvetica, the script is Vivaldi.  
F
